synopsis.text: While pursuing a childhood promise to her late father, the cheerful and magic-wielding Sora Suzuki leaves her tranquil countryside life in Biei for the bustling city of Tokyo. To become a licensed mage and accept magical job requests, Sora must first complete a summer apprenticeship. As she adapts to the fast-paced urban lifestyle, she encounters a diverse group of individuals, including the self-assured Asagi, the kind-hearted Hiyori, and the enigmatic Gouta, who struggles with his own magical abilities. Together, they navigate the challenges of their internships, forging friendships and learning valuable life lessons along the way. With determination and a positive outlook, Sora embraces her new experiences, overcoming obstacles and growing as a mage in the enchanting world of Someday's Dreamers.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
